Html:
PHPWord can't embed xlsx files generated with PHPExcel and, while it can embed the xls-output of PHPExcel, when trying to open these excel attachments in the Word document generated by PHPWord, I get an error message ("Convert File" .... "Convert Text from:" ...).

Is there any way to solve this problem?

Replying to myself. I've figured out what needs to be done to let PHPWord embed xlsx attachments into a Word document (and also PDF, docx, pptx and other formats). I should have the modified code in a few days. Once this is ready, can this be made available for anybody as an updated version of PHPWord?

To the person who contacted me via the contact form asking about the above:
  1. The email sent by codeplex to me has a garbled link (unreadable in Eudora), so I can't reply directly to you.
  2. In any case you will find the solution to the problem here:
https://phpword.codeplex.com/discussions/437084

Message to the codeplex team: please stop sending base64 (UTF-8 ?) emails. These are unreadable in Eudora. This is what you see when you open the emails in Eudora:
